jodd.db.jtx

Class DbJtxTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.jtx.JtxTransaction
      • jodd.db.jtx.DbJtxTransaction

  • public class DbJtxTransaction
extends JtxTransaction
    JtxTransaction extension that simplifies beginning of the transaction since related DbJtxTransactionManager allows only one resource type.
